reviewText:
Highly recommend.  If you get a chance to take a class with Tony or watch him perform you will not be disappointed.  Absolutely fantastic.  In his
classes he is extremely generous with information, humorous, and focused.  A rare combo.
This DVD is done well-easy to see fingering and the songs and sound are gorgeous.

Useful as it has both video and sheet music for the student (I bought it for VCE music students)
Pieces are very playable
